service.get: select ap_id,ap_name,ap_desc,ap_url,province_code,area_code,state,bind_oper,create_staff,all_to_str(create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss')create_time,region,chnl_code,all_to_str(eff_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss')eff_date,all_to_str(exp_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss')exp_date,ap_type from ap_define where ap_id=#{ap_id}
service.query:
select ap_id,ap_name,ap_desc,ap_url,province_code,area_code,state,bind_oper,create_staff,all_to_str(create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss')create_time,region,chnl_code,all_to_str(eff_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss')eff_date,all_to_str(exp_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss')exp_date,ap_type from ap_define where 1=1 and state='0'
and ap_id = '${filter.ap_id}'
and ap_name like '%${filter.ap_name}%'
limit 0,1000

select ap_id,ap_name,ap_desc,ap_url,province_code,area_code,state,bind_oper,create_staff,all_to_str(create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss')create_time,region,chnl_code,all_to_str(eff_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss')eff_date,all_to_str(exp_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mm:ss')exp_date,ap_type from ap_define where 1=1 and state='0' limit 0,1000

service.get: select id,ap_id,developer_no,developer_name from ap_developer where ap_id=#{ap_id}

service.query: select order_attr_id,order_id,attr_type,attr_id,attr_value from info_order_attr where order_id=#{filter.order_id} and attr_id=#{filter.attr_id}
select order_attr_id,order_id,attr_type,attr_id,attr_value from info_order_attr where attr_id=#{filter.attr_id} and attr_value=#{filter.attr_value}
select order_attr_id,order_id,attr_type,attr_id,attr_value from info_order_attr where order_id=#{filter.order_id}
service.update: update info_order_attr set order_id=#{order_id},attr_type=#{attr_type},attr_id=#{attr_id},attr_value=#{attr_value} where order_id=#{order_id} and attr_id=#{attr_id}

service.query: select order_id,parent_order_id,cust_id,express_flag,order_status,finish_date,dev_channel_id,dev_id,create_operator_id,create_date,order_type,order_sub_type,update_date,tele_type,order_source,pay_flag,order_flag,sign_flag,eparchy_code,related_sn,ctrl_sn,mobile_number,mobile_kind,recommend_id,create_uniform_oper,bill_flag,handle_oper_no from info_order where order_id=#{filter.order_id}
select list_id,type_code,code_id,code_name,seq_id,macro_code,parent_type_code,parent_code_id,eff_flag from apc.code_list where type_code=#{filter.type_code}
select area_code,parent_area_code,area_name,province_code from code_area where parent_area_code=#{filter.parent_area_code}
select area_code,parent_area_code,area_name,province_code from code_area where area_code in (select province_code from code_area group by province_code)

select * from log_pay_cs where 1=1
and cs_order_id = #{filter.cs_order_id} and create_date =(SELECT max(create_date) FROM crm_order.log_pay_cs WHERE cs_order_id = #{filter.cs_order_id})

select * from log_pay_cs where 1=1
and serv_order_no = #{filter.serv_order_no} and create_date =(SELECT max(create_date) FROM log_pay_cs WHERE serv_order_no = #{filter.serv_order_no})

select * from log_pay_cs where 1=1
and cs_order_id like '%${filter.cs_order_id}%' and create_date =(SELECT max(create_date) FROM crm_order.log_pay_cs WHERE cs_order_id like '%${filter.cs_order_id}%')

service.update: update ap_attr set ap_id=#{ap_id},attr_type=#{attr_type}, attr_id=#{attr_id},attr_value=#{attr_value},attr_name=#{attr_name} where id=#{id}
service.query: select id,ap_id,attr_type,attr_id,attr_value,attr_name from ap_attr where id=#{filter.id}
